name: Merry Xmas Santa
description: Merry Xmas Santa is a 2D platform game. The player controls Santa Claus and must visit all chimneys. He must jump between rooftops (falls from heights are lethal), avoid flying sad faces and falling icicles. After a visit in all the chimneys, Santa Claus goes to the next level. The player has 3 lives.
alsoFor: BBC Micro, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
